item.title: Apollo, Blackstone See Opportunities in Banks' Troubles
item.description: Private lenders Apollo Global Management and Blackstone Inc. are exploring financing options with publicly listed companies in Europe as borrowing costs spiked and equity valuations fell. This move comes amid growing concerns about the banking industry as traditional banks struggle with a range of issues, including low interest rates, rising competition from fintech startups, and mounting regulatory pressures.
